column4: this doesn't sit well with me; i uninstalled opera thru synaptic choosing complete removal and when i re-installed opera all my previous settings were intact, does this have anything to do with the fact that i'm running ubuntu in live mode or is it a flaw in synaptic
removing opera completely through synaptic does not remove the .opera folder in your /home/username/ directory
so if you dont need the settings , you can delete it
